title: Rangers looking to sign right-winger Mussolini

author: randomusername123xyz
text: The optics on this are weird. Rangers fans will more than likely vote for a left wing party in Scotland, while Celtic fans will likely vote for a nationalist party. But PR goes a long way I suppose.
